page.title: 09Sports Day
page.content: On Wednesday 19th June, Wigtown Primary School held their sportsday{ {event}. It was a great day with plenty of excitement. It all started with the potato and spoon race. Then it was the{flat {races,}which the local villagers, mums, dads and little brothers and sisters all enjoyed. There were also wild horses, three-legged and sack races. Primary five, six and seven were split into two teams. The teams were called{Cree {and Bladnoch.}If you were in these classes and you won a race, your points were put in a book and added up at the end. The most exciting events were the{relay races.}The best of these races was the boys "A" team relay race, which Cree won easily. Eventually, however, Bladnoch won overall by ten points - 167v157.
